{"rule":"COMMA_PARENTHESIS_WHITESPACE","sentence":"^\\Q</div> <p></p> <style> img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } </style> <h5>First attempt to calculate the deformation of the deformation in flexure.</h5> <p>The basic idea was to make a tapered section (cone) and push the tapered section coin, which would push the flexure arms.\\E$"}
{"rule":"WHITESPACE_RULE","sentence":"^\\QThe total force acting on each of the arm is   </p> <img src=\"flexure/plunger.png\"></img> <p>\\(F'\\div3 sin(\\theta)=F\\) <a href=\"https://physics.stackexchange.com/questions/53515/force-exerted-on-a-cone\">explainiation to the can be cound here</a> </p> <p> mass of the M16 nut \\(m_{1} = 0.0338kg \\) </p> <p> mass of the M20 nut \\(m_{2} = 0.06035kg\\)</p> <p> mass of the tapered coin \\(m_{c}= 0.00165kg\\) <p> acceleration due to gravity, \\(g = 9.85m/s^2\\) ;(determined from phone's acceleretrometer)</p> <p> Dial indicator's measuring force determined \\(m_{d}=\\sim 0.062 kg\\) ; <a href=\"https://shop.mitutoyo.eu/web/mitutoyo/en/mitutoyo/Metric_Dial_Ind_Series%201%20and%202_AGD%20ANSI/Dial%20Gauge%2C%20Flat%20Back%2C%20ANSI-AGD%20Type/$catalogue/mitutoyoData/PR/2046A-11/index.xhtml;jsessionid=71AEC3A6A1046AB7B9D2AF3BF5286107\"> Mitutoyo website mentions from 0.4-1.4N</a> <img class=\"fit\" src=\"flexure/acceleration.jpeg\" > </img> <div class=\"demo-crumbs mdl-color-text--grey-600\" style=\"text-align:center\"> My phone's accelerometer showing acceleration due to gravity.\\E$"}
{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QThe total force acting on each of the arm is   </p> <img src=\"flexure/plunger.png\"></img> <p>\\(F'\\div3 sin(\\theta)=F\\) <a href=\"https://physics.stackexchange.com/questions/53515/force-exerted-on-a-cone\">explainiation to the can be cound here</a> </p> <p> mass of the M16 nut \\(m_{1} = 0.0338kg \\) </p> <p> mass of the M20 nut \\(m_{2} = 0.06035kg\\)</p> <p> mass of the tapered coin \\(m_{c}= 0.00165kg\\) <p> acceleration due to gravity, \\(g = 9.85m/s^2\\) ;(determined from phone's acceleretrometer)</p> <p> Dial indicator's measuring force determined \\(m_{d}=\\sim 0.062 kg\\) ; <a href=\"https://shop.mitutoyo.eu/web/mitutoyo/en/mitutoyo/Metric_Dial_Ind_Series%201%20and%202_AGD%20ANSI/Dial%20Gauge%2C%20Flat%20Back%2C%20ANSI-AGD%20Type/$catalogue/mitutoyoData/PR/2046A-11/index.xhtml;jsessionid=71AEC3A6A1046AB7B9D2AF3BF5286107\"> Mitutoyo website mentions from 0.4-1.4N</a> <img class=\"fit\" src=\"flexure/acceleration.jpeg\" > </img> <div class=\"demo-crumbs mdl-color-text--grey-600\" style=\"text-align:center\"> My phone's accelerometer showing acceleration due to gravity.\\E$"}
